title: Application Context
description: Metadata about the application emitting events, including name, version, environment, and platform.

name.description: The human-readable name of the application.

build.description: The build number or identifier (e.g. 1234, abc123f).

environment.description: The deployment environment the application is running in.

platform.description: The platform or runtime the application is built for.

namespace.description: The reverse-domain namespace of the application (e.g. com.example.app).
